text: Uladzimir Iosifavich Mihurski (; ; Vladimir Iosifovich Migurskiy; born 13 June 1968) is a former Belarusian football player. ==Honours== ;Torpedo Mogilev *Belarusian Cup finalist: 1995 ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Dnepr Mogilev players Category:FC Zorya Luhansk players Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Belarusian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Torpedo Mogilev players Category:Expatriate footballers in Kuwait Category:FC Transmash Mogilev players
title: Uladzimir Mihurski
